metadata.title: CVE-2018-13874 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in the HDF HDF5 1.8.20 library. There is a stack-based buffer overflow in the function H5FD_sec2_read in H5FDsec2.c, related to HDmemset.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
